title: New account

name.title: Name
name.warning: Make sure you're satisfied with this account name as it can't be edited after creation.

finishTitle: Account creation request was successfully created!
finishDesc: Your request to create an account was created and now it has a pending status until it is approved by your security scheme
finishEditTitle: Account edit request was successfully created!
finishEditDesc: Your request to edit the account was created and now it has a pending status until it is approved by your security scheme
